summary: For two-handed katana and greatsword user, here is a new 'normal attack animations' pack.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][size=6]

[center]Nameless swordsmanship[/center][/size][center][size=5][/size][/center][center]Warning: literally it is a new 'normal attack moveset' for two-handed greatsword (It also contains parry, run, sprintattack, powerattack that reused from my previous work though)
and it is bit Eastern art style. :[ 







[size=5]Description[/size]




Have you ever seen one of my mods named 'wolf's skill' animation?

It has to be familiar movement cause I reuse the 'power attack animations' from that mod and so on..

But the main ideas of it is , I have made more simple moveset of normal attacks[size=3] [/size]solving slippery problem. 
now you can wield your swords at the right moment while rushing about in front of your enemies without feeling weird slippery footstep.

oh, actually I'm not confident about that much.. but you.. may afford little glitch.

 Please watch the demo videos 


[size=3]








Demo in whitestudio (~59s slowmotion)[/size]

[youtube]zLAQ7vtu09c[/youtube]

[size=3]Demo for movement

[/size][youtube]D8Z2e-hYOxw[/youtube]




[size=5]Requirement[/size]

you can try my mod without FNIS 
but it will be really helpful catching and solving of unknown glitches

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/?]Fores New Idles in Skyrim - FNIS by [b]fore[/b] [/url]





[size=5]Installation[/size]

there are two version for download

1. 1st person + third person view(little weird, arms are floating around your body)
2. only third person view (recommended, 1st person view is still vanilla moveset)



[size=4]1. manual install[/size]
[size=3]

1.Unzip the file and you will find the 'data' folder.
paste it(including contents) on proper 'data' route in your game folder.
if you are using other attack animations than overwrite it.


2.run FNIS (find requirement section) to prevent the glitch [/size]

[size=4]

2.  NMM[/size]

[size=3]1. just install it in the same way you did

2. run FNIS (find requirement section) to prevent the glitch 

[/size]




QnA

If you have any problem find 
comments me 

1. Q: I have wielding sound problem .
A: unless, I made the animations with original rig file and key note (XPMS may be compatible I'm not sure), there should be problem occur, 
it is just an early work and I might have mistake while making animations so feel free to tell me details.


2. Asking about Clothes, ENB(graphic mod), etc will be not accepted . sorry for my tone(and bad English) but really I can not reply all the request. 

3. Q: is this mod changing all 2h animations?
A: Only 2 handed greatsword animation will be changed. but without PCEA2 mods every NPC will use this moveset with 2 handed greatsword. 



-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
for about credit
No modification allowed for commercial applications.
Don't use motion sources in the contents without my permission please. 


I recently made it without 'Havok tools' plugin (it turned to be 'pay to use') and if you are the modders that have the free version(not a latest one) for animate
pm me. 

[/center][left]








[/left]
author: cyh0405
